TopicTitle: Will there ever be another "Destroy Green Iron Crown!" Thread?

Articles.Content: That was really fun. Does anyone know if he will ever come back?
Can we please not do that again

Green Iron Crown, Alexander the Great, Julius Caesar, Napoleon Bonaparte. Men like that come only once every few generations.

Shed no tears for that he is gone, but smile; His brilliance had shined upon us all. Take comfort in that.

Can we please not do that again

I agree, that was kind of pointless, and an experiment by the moderators with negative rep.

An experiment? Great. Now this has turned into divergent.

Anyways, are they considering putting in a negative rep system?

Anyways, are they considering putting in a negative rep system?

As far as I know, the original thread basically had all the moderators saying in chorus: "No"

So, no neg rep system probably. If you want to tell someone their post is stupid, say it to their face like a warrior in a battlefield, with honour and pride and ready to take the hit.

As opposed to a button on an internet forum. Moderators are busy enough probably, they don't want "stupid people slap fights", a phrase I coined from personal experience, caused by negative rep. "Why did you negative rep my post!?" would be sung in chorus, and the moderators would have to stand as a mighty bastion to prevent fights in the forum. As you can see, it's just best to leave it as is. If someones post is REALLY bad, then it's probably breaking the rules, so you could just report it...

"Better we can bring people up than bring them down" -Vexx32, I think

Edited February 6, 2015 by Norpo
hedging my bet that nobody knows what the hail a bastion is

Anyways, are they considering putting in a negative rep system?

Considering putting one in? They took the thing out.

I would say no. Too much spreading to people who did not deserve rep.

Negative rep came with the forum software, which this forum decided not to use. But the function was still there, and some moderators decided to experiment with it to see if it would be useful. On the contrary: we made a dopey mistake and hit a forum member with negative rep. Also, the dummy account we made to experiment with it got loose on the forum somehow, and it became a joke and big mess. With this in mind, the negrep was completely disabled, and will not be seen again.

In summation, it's gone and not coming back, so do not expect to see any iron crowns that are other than red.
I had a BIC avatar... it's gone now.
moreover, Green Iron Crown is no longer a being. I viewed some of his old posts, for inspiriation, and his profile is deleted.

Negative rep came with the forum software, which this forum decided not to use. But the function was still there, and some moderators decided to experiment with it to see if it would be useful. I was that forum member. (Or one of them, anyway.)
